name: Road To Siren Hills: Dark Journey
name_original: Road To Siren Hills: Dark Journey
description:
Your car has died in the middle of nowhere. 
The only thing you see is darkness and a flashlight lying on the grass.
Your only option is to go on foot, but where will the journey lead you to?

Road To Siren Hills: Dark Journey is an extended version of
Road To Siren Hills - an atmospheric, psychological horror game inspired by the Silent Hill series. 

Have fun and get scared.
